MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL35 postcode area of Aberdovey, affecting properties in Tai Newyddion and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.46PM on 15th October 2020.
